events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to get a refund because this is not what I paid for and I am quite disappointed.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized as a refund case based on the customer's request regarding incorrect delivery.
This refund case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Maria for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your incorrect order.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can verify and process your refund?
I have attached the photos and my order number is 45781239. Please let me know if you need anything else to approve the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been processed successfully. If you have any further issues, please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is now satisfactory on your end.
Since the refund was received and there are no further concerns, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
